mapper.insert: INSERT INTO document (point, content, countToLike, countToDislike, countToComment, countToShare, providerUserId, name, ipAddress, regDate) VALUES (#{point}, #{content}, #{countToLike}, #{countToDislike}, #{countToComment}, #{countToShare}, #{providerUserId}, #{name}, #{ipAddress}, NOW());
mapper.update: UPDATE document SET point = #{point}, content = #{content}, countToLike = #{countToLike}, countToDislike = #{countToDislike}, countToComment = #{countToComment}, countToShare = #{countToShare}, providerUserId = #{providerUserId}, name = #{name}, ipAddress = #{ipAddress} where documentId = #{documentId};
UPDATE document SET countToComment = countToComment + 1 where documentId = #{documentId};
UPDATE document SET countToComment = countToComment - 1 where documentId = #{documentId};
UPDATE document SET countToLike = countToLike + 1 where documentId = #{documentId};
UPDATE document SET countToDislike = countToDislike + 1 where documentId = #{documentId};
UPDATE document SET countToShare = countToShare + 1 where documentId = #{documentId};
